[RailDirtRoadIntersectionSolutions]
;
; straight road, straight rail
rot0=0x02000200,0x00020002,0x57001500,1,0
rot1=0x00020002,0x02000200,0x57001500,0,0
;
rot0=0x02000200,0x00040004,0x57001500,1,0
rot1=0x00020002,0x04000400,0x57001500,0,0

;
;ortho rhw x diagonal cross network
;
TYPE1=0x00030100,0x02000200,0x57004500,2,0
TYPE2=0x03010000,0x00020002,0x57004500,3,0
TYPE3=0x01000003,0x02000200,0x57004500,0,0
TYPE4=0x00000301,0x00020002,0x57004500,1,0
TYPE5=0x00000301,0x02000200,0x57004500,2,1
TYPE6=0x00030100,0x00020002,0x57004500,1,1
TYPE7=0x03010000,0x02000200,0x57004500,0,1
TYPE8=0x01000003,0x00020002,0x57004500,3,1
;
;;diagonal rhw, straight cross network
1=0X00020002,0X00000301,0x57007500,2,0
2=0X02000200,0X00030100,0x57007500,3,0
3=0X00020002,0X03010000,0x57007500,0,0
4=0X02000200,0X01000003,0x57007500,1,0
5=0X00020002,0X00030100,0x57007500,2,1
6=0X02000200,0X00000301,0x57007500,3,1
7=0X00020002,0X01000003,0x57007500,0,1
8=0X02000200,0X03010000,0x57007500,1,1

;
;diagonal rhw x diagonal cross network
;
TYPE1=0x03010000,0x01000003,0x5700A500,0,1
TYPE2=0x01000003,0x00000301,0x5700A500,3,1
TYPE3=0x00000301,0x00030100,0x5700A500,2,1
TYPE4=0x00030100,0x03010000,0x5700A500,1,1
TYPE5=0x01000003,0x03010000,0x5700A500,0,0
TYPE6=0x00000301,0x01000003,0x5700A500,1,0
TYPE7=0x00030100,0x00000301,0x5700A500,2,0
TYPE8=0x03010000,0x00030100,0x5700A500,3,0
;
;draggable DDRHW-4 (Rail-based) added 01/23/2011 by Tarkus
;--RHW-4 Starter Piece--
TYPE1=0x02000200,0x00010100,0x57530000,2,0
TYPE2=0x00020002,0x01010000,0x57530000,3,0
TYPE3=0x02000200,0x01000001,0x57530000,0,0
TYPE4=0x00020002,0x00000101,0x57530000,1,0
;--RHW-4 After Bulldoze--
TYPE1=0x02000000,0x00010100,0x57530000,2,0
TYPE2=0x00000002,0x01010000,0x57530000,3,0
TYPE3=0x00000200,0x01000001,0x57530000,0,0
TYPE4=0x00020000,0x00000101,0x57530000,1,0

;L1 Onslope
TYPE1=0x04000000,0x02000200,0x57700000,2,0
TYPE2=0x00000004,0x00020002,0x57700000,3,0
TYPE3=0x00000400,0x02000200,0x57700000,0,0
TYPE4=0x00040000,0x00020002,0x57700000,1,0

;L2 Onslope
TYPE1=0x00040000,0x02000200,0x57700100,2,0
TYPE2=0x04000000,0x00020002,0x57700100,3,0
TYPE3=0x00000004,0x02000200,0x57700100,0,0
TYPE4=0x00000400,0x00020002,0x57700100,1,0

;FLEX Ramp-Style Transition
;Ascent Starter
TYPE1=0x00040404,0x02000200,0x57700230,0,0
TYPE2=0x04040400,0x00020002,0x57700230,1,0
TYPE3=0x04040004,0x02000200,0x57700230,2,0
TYPE4=0x04000404,0x00020002,0x57700230,3,0

;Ascent Ender L1
TYPE1=0x00040400,0x02000200,0x57700200,0,0
TYPE2=0x04040000,0x00020002,0x57700200,1,0
TYPE3=0x04000004,0x02000200,0x57700200,2,0
TYPE4=0x00000404,0x00020002,0x57700200,3,0

;Ascent Ender L2
TYPE1=0x03040400,0x02000200,0x57700300,0,0
TYPE2=0x04040003,0x00020002,0x57700300,1,0
TYPE3=0x04000304,0x02000200,0x57700300,2,0
TYPE4=0x00030404,0x00020002,0x57700300,3,0



;RRW flex OSTs added 26 Jan 2016 by Swordmaster
;L1 Onslope
